articles.description: Holders Manchester United are drawn away to record 14-time winners Arsenal in the third round of the FA Cup.
articles.title: FA Cup third round draw: Arsenal host holders Manchester United

articles.description: New Leicester City manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says he was "astonished" by the amount of interest in him after his brief spell as Manchester United boss.
articles.title: Leicester City: Ruud van Nistelrooy "astonished" by offers after Manchester United spell

articles.description: A new logo for the men's Six Nations which aims to encapsulate the "electrifying action" of the tournament has attracted derision from many fans.
articles.title: Six Nations rebrand: Fans criticise new logo for 2025

articles.description: Qualifying for Euro 2025 "is everything" for Scotland, says midfielder Caroline Weir before Tuesday's play-off final second leg in Finland.
articles.title: Finland vs Scotland: UEFA Women's Championship Qualification stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on rock band The Slow Readers Club with his predictions for the midweek Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v The Slow Readers Club bassist James Ryan

articles.description: The father of Olympic 5,000m champion Jakob Ingebrigtsen will stand trial next year after being charged with alleged physical abuse against his son.
articles.title: Jakob Ingebrigtsen: Olympic champion's father Gjert charged with alleged with physical and mental abuse

articles.description: Real Madrid make contact with Manchester United's Diogo Dalot, Mohamed Salah is willing to accept a one-year deal at Liverpool, while Wayne Rooney is under pressure at Plymouth Argyle.
articles.title: Football gossip: Dalot, Salah, Diallo, Sane, Rooney, Khusanov

articles.description: Ipswich Town say captain Sam Morsy did not wear a rainbow armband during the Premier League loss at Nottingham Forest because of religious beliefs.
articles.title: Sam Morsy: Ipswich Town captain did not wear rainbow armband because of 'religious beliefs'

articles.description: McLaren call for an inquiry into the penalty Lando Norris was given for ignoring yellow flags during the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Qatar GP 2024: McLaren call for inquiry into Norris penalty

articles.description: Anna Howells, content creator for Spurs XY and long-suffering Tottenham fan, bristles at the term “Spursy” being used about her team – but admits it is an apt description.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur: How do Spurs solve their chronic inconsistency?
